Package icyllis.arc3d.engine

Class ConservativeClip

java.lang.Object
icyllis.arc3d.engine.ConservativeClip
public final class ConservativeClip extends Object
The conservative clip computes the maximum rectangular bounds of the actual clipping region for quick reject (a preprocessing before transferring drawing commands to GPU).
